stem: A client with alcoholic cirrhosis is admitted with severe confusion, asterixis, and a fetid breath odor. Complete the bowtie to guide care.

parameters.text: Frequency and consistency of bowel movements
Mental status and Level of Consciousness

rationale.correct: Ammonia buildup causes neurotoxicity (Encephalopathy). Lactulose (laxative) and Rifaximin (antibiotic) both reduce ammonia production/absorption. Bowel movement monitoring is essential as Lactulose effectiveness is measured by having 2-3 soft stools/day.
rationale.incorrect: High-protein diets can worsen ammonia levels. Chlorpromazine is an antipsychotic and can mask neuro changes or worsen liver strain.

questionTrap.trap: Thinking Lactulose is just for constipation
questionTrap.howToOvercome: Its main job in cirrhosis is trapping ammonia in the gut to be excreted.

reviewUnits.heading: Priority Interventions for Hepatic Encephalopathy
reviewUnits.body: The priority nursing interventions are: Administer PO/Rectal Lactulose; Initiate IV Rifaximin. Monitor: Mental status and Level of Consciousness; Frequency and consistency of bowel movements. High-protein diets can worsen ammonia levels. Chlorpromazine is an antipsychotic and can mask neuro changes or worsen liver strain.
